settings.intro:
For every added variable 8 tags will be made:
  • {variable} duration
  • {variable} duration in seconds
  • {variable} difference
  • {variable} currency
  • {variable} calculation
  • {variable} decimals
    • <
  • {variable} text
    • <
  • {variable} replaced text
These will be filled by the different flow cards and after that can be used inside flows.
settings.delete-confirm: Are you sure to execute this action?
settings.delete-confirm-single: Are you sure to execute this action? Delete '__var__'
